contentList:
-- Actor Your Charisma increases by 1. Your Proficiency Bonus is also doubled for Deception and Performance Checks. You have become a true thespian. Your Charisma increases by [1]. Your Proficiency Bonus is doubled for Deception and Performance Checks. -- Athlete When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump distance also increases by 50%.

Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1. When you are Prone, standing up uses only [1] of your movement speed. Your Jump distance is increased by 50%. Athlete: Strength Athlete: Dexterity -- Durable Your Constitution increases by 1. You regain full hit points each time you take a Short Rest. You regain full hit points when you take a Short Rest. Your Constitution is increased by [1]. -- Heavily Armoured You gain Armour Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength increases by 1. You have Armour Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength is increased by [1]. -- Heavy Armour Master Your Strength increases by 1. Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour. Your Strength is increased by [1]. Incoming damage from non-magical attacks is reduced by [3] while you're wearing heavy armour. -- Lightly Armoured You gain Armour Proficiency with Light Armour and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1. Lightly Armoured: Strength Lightly Armoured: Dexterity -- Moderately Armoured You gain Armour Proficiency with Medium Armour and shields, and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1. Moderately Armoured: Strength Moderately Armoured: Dexterity -- Performer You gain Musical Instrument Proficiency, and your Charisma increases by 1. -- Tavern Brawler When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your Strength Modifier is added to the damage and Attack Rolls.

Your Strength or Constitution increases by 1. When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your Strength Modifier is added to the damage and Attack Rolls. Tavern Brawler: Strength Tavern Brawler: Constitution -- Weapon Master You gain Proficiency with four weapons of your choice, and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1. Weapon Master: Strength Weapon Master: Dexterity -- Resilient You increase an Ability by 1, and gain Proficiency in that Ability's Saving Throws. -- Shared Increase your Strength by [1]. Increase your Dexterity by [1]. Increase your Constitution by [1].
